title: Claim the Adoption Credit
description: A couple adopted a child during the year and wants to claim the adoption tax credit for their expenses.

tasks.description: Gather documentation of all qualified adoption expenses (e.g., court costs, attorney fees).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all relevant receipts and invoices.

tasks.description: Verify the total expenses and the year the adoption became final.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all details needed for the credit.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 8839, Qualified Adoption Expenses, to calculate the allowable credit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the credit, subject to income limitations.
